holidays.title: International Strange Music Day
holidays.description: Listen to a genre of music or an artist that you’d usually not consider.

holidays.title: Kobe Bryant Day
holidays.description: Kobe Bryant was more than a basketball player; he was an inspiration and a cultural icon.

holidays.title: Liberia Flag Day
holidays.description: It’s not just a flag, it’s proof of independence, courage, and moral excellence.

holidays.title: Melaka Governor's Birthday
holidays.description: Today is a public holiday to celebrate the officeholder’s birthday — it’s Melaka Governor’s Birthday.

holidays.title: National Emory Day
holidays.description: Though Emory is a gender-neutral name, parents are more likely to name their boys Emory than girls.

holidays.title: National Knife Day
holidays.description: Sharpen your knives and get ready to show off your chopping skills.

holidays.title: National Peach Pie Day
holidays.description: Get ready to help yourself to a generous serving of peach pie

holidays.title: National SKAM Artist Day
holidays.description: Today is all about celebrating the original SKAM artist himself, Sujit Kundu.

holidays.title: Pluto Demoted Day
holidays.description: After nearly 80 years as an official planet, Pluto was demoted down to a dwarf planet.

holidays.title: Pride Cymru
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the LGBTQ+ community this year in honor of Pride Cymru.

holidays.title: St Bartholomew History
holidays.description: Learn about the life and teaching of St. Bartholomew and his importance.

holidays.title: Ukraine Independence Day
holidays.description: Let’s wave the blue and yellow flag of Ukraine together and celebrate this day with pride.

holidays.title: Vesuvius Day
holidays.description: Today commemorates the fateful day when Mount Vesuvius erupted in the city of Pompeii.

holidays.title: William Wilberforce Day
holidays.description: William Wilberforce led the anti-slavery movement in Great Britain. Let’s learn more about this extraordinary man.

holidays.title: Callum The Dragon’s Birthday
holidays.description: We love how this young blood pushes boundaries and challenges himself to try new things.

holidays.title: Catherine Paiz’s Birthday
holidays.description: She works tirelessly with her husband, Austin, to create content for their hungry audience.

holidays.title: Chad Michael Murray’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented and skillful entertainer has created a name for himself throughout his successful career.

holidays.title: Dave Chappelle’s Birthday
holidays.description: You cannot talk about the ‘comedy-greats’ of all time and not mention this funny man.

holidays.title: Rupert Grint’s Birthday
holidays.description: What a privilege we’ve had to watch this performer morph from child actor to seasoned professional
